lead_paragraph: Shares of the appliance maker Whirlpool dropped after the company said its results were hurt by the appreciating value of the dollar.

headline.print_headline: Mixed Results for the Market as Oil Rises and Tech Falls
headline.main: Wall St. Ends Mixed as Oil Rises and Tech Falls

snippet: Shares of the appliance maker Whirlpool dropped after the company said its results were hurt by the appreciating value of the dollar.
abstract: Stocks rise modestly in cautious trading session.
